Shipping within the continental USA estimated at $15. Other countries shipping will vary. These charges will be added through our fulfillment company.

Shipping within the continental USA estimated at $15. Other countries shipping will vary. These charges will be added through our fulfillment company.

support.title: Wargamer PACK

Shipping within the continental USA estimated at $15. Other countries shipping will vary. These charges will be added through our fulfillment company.

support.title: OLD GUARD – 1 LUXURY edition book

Shipping within the continental USA estimated at $15. Other countries shipping will vary. These charges will be added through our fulfillment company.

support.title: Smoking Wyrm #3 PRINT & UNIQUE INK #1
support.descp:
At this level you are pledging for the unique, full-size (11x17) cover art for issue 3, hand inked by the artist, Joel Phillips. This color inking is unique and unlike any of the other hand-colored covers for this issue. It is labeled on the back "Smoking Wyrm Cover #3; Hand-colored #1" and signed by Joel Phillips.
Please see the story for a low resolution scan of the exact piece of art. Note that the scan does not convey the true coolness of this piece. Joel Phillips receives an artist bonus when a backer selects this level of reward.
You will also receive a limited run, high-quality Riso print version of issue #3, and a PDF copy of issue #3.
—
Digital delivery through DriveThruRPG.com.
Add-ons will incur additional shipping charges.
INCLUDES:
Tales from the Smoking Wyrm No.3 PDF
Tales from the Smoking Wyrm No.3 PRINT
Unique Hand-colored cover art #1

support.title: My World
support.descp:
You always wanted to create a world populated by purple unicorns, living in a forest of glass surrounded by mountains made of candy cones?
With this reward, Caeora will create a full set of world & city assets, tailored to your personal world and Till from DUNGEONFOG will set up the world, regions, cities and locations for you.
Additionally, you will get free lifetime access and all the other rewards included in Lifetime.
INCLUDES:
Digital World Anvil badge
Digital DGNFOG badge
Early access - ALPHA 1 (Spring 2020)
3 additional Kickstarter exclusive art packs by Caeora
Exclusive access to DEIOS Worldbuilding series by the GreatGM
Free Lifetime Subscription

Your own world

support.title: RETAILERS ONLY (PRIEST x6)
support.descp:
For shop owners who want to make Mythic Wars available to their customers. **Proof of retail business ownership required.** Six copies of the "Mythic Wars: Clash of the Gods" base set and six copies of the "Mythic Wars: Cthulhu Rises" expansion set, both at wholesale price, plus a set of promotional cards. We will be happy to provide shipping at cost for international shop owners. Please contact us via email or direct message to verify eligibility when choosing this tier.
INCLUDES:
6× "Mythic Wars: Clash of the Gods" Base Set
6× "Mythic Wars: Cthulhu Rises" Expansion Set
